subject: Boxing
Olympic Games (2012)
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: Marlen Esparza will represent the United States when women’s boxing makes its debut as an Olympic event, but hopeful Quanitta Underwood’s chances are now hanging by a thread.
snippet: Marlen Esparza will represent the United States when women’s boxing makes its debut as an Olympic event, but hopeful Quanitta Underwood’s chances are now hanging by a thread.
